text: Unfaithful Mornings () is a Canadian drama film, directed by François Bouvier and Jean Beaudry and released in 1989."Matins infidèles, Les – Film de Jean Beaudry et François Bouvier". Films du Québec, January 29, 2009. An exploration of the creative process, the film stars Denis Bouchard as Jean- Marc, a photographer undertaking a project in which he photographs the same street corner each morning at 8 a.m., and Beaudry as Marc, a novelist who is writing a fiction work based on the photographs. Bouvier and Beaudry received a Genie Award nomination for Best Director at the 11th Genie Awards."Arcand's Jesus leads Genie race".
